General.Name: Ningbo Dechang Electrical Machinery Made Co Ltd
General.Description: Ningbo Dechang Electrical Machinery Made Co., Ltd. produces and sells vacuum cleaner motors in China. The company offers horizontal dust bag, cyclone dust cup, and charging mode vacuum cleaner products. It also offers EPS brushless motors for automobiles. Ningbo Dechang Electrical Machinery Made Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Yuyao, China.
General.Address: No.18 YongXing East Road, Yuyao, China, 315400
